OutputChatConfirm.Title: Enable Output to Chat for All Conditions?
OutputChatConfirm.Content: Click 'Yes' to enable 'Output to Chat' on all Conditions

SystemIconRefresh.Title: Reset icons?
SystemIconRefresh.Content: The "Use System Icons" setting was changed. Would you like to reset icons on all conditions?

ConditionLab.NoReference: --No Reference Entry-- (Drag a Journal, Item, Actor, etc. into this field to set)
ConditionLab.SortAnchorTitle: Sort by Name - unsorted (click to change)
ConditionLab.SortAnchorTitle_asc: Sort by Name - A to Z (click to change)
ConditionLab.SortAnchorTitle_desc: Sort by Name - Z to A (click to change)

SortDirectionSave.Title: Save Mapping with Sort Direction?
SortDirectionSave.Content: Click 'Yes' to save the Condition Lab map with the current sort direction. Click 'No' to cancel Saving.

ConditionLab.BadReference: Could not build a link to the dropped content (actor, item, journal etc)

Groups.RequiredD: Conditions that are required by the system in order to function. These cannot be disabled.
Groups.CommonD: Commonly used conditions from the list of default SWADE system conditions.
Groups.UncommonD: Less often used conditions from the list of default SWADE system conditions.
Groups.RareD: Rarely used conditions from the list of default SWADE system conditions.
Groups.ExpandedPowersD: Conditions associated with powers in the core rules.
Groups.PowerModifiersD: Conditions associated with the common Power Modifiers.
Groups.PathfinderPowersD: Conditions associated with powers in Pathfinder.
Groups.GenericD: Generic conditions for general purpose usage.

Dialog.RefreshMapDefaultsB:
Would you like to refresh your current map to match the new defaults?

This will ensure that the list of conditions matches the defaults but will not reset any existing conditions. We will attempt to maintain current sort order as much as possible.

TokenDisplaySettingsMenu.Title: Token Display Settings
TokenDisplaySettingsMenu.Hint: Controls the appearance behaviour of the token effect icons

Settings.SizeD: Sets the size for effect icons on the token.
Settings.BGShapeD: The shape of the background behind the effect icons.
Settings.PositioningD: How the effect icons are positioned on the token.

MacroConfig.Heading: Macros to Execute
MacroConfig.Description: Select a macro to execute when this condition is added to or removed from a token/actor

OptionConfig.Heading: Options

BlindToken.Label: Blind Token
BlindToken.Notes: When applied, this Condition will also cause the token to be blinded (the player will not be able to see other tokens in the map)

MarkInvisible.Label: Mark Invisible
MarkInvisible.Notes: When applied, this Condition will cause the affected Token to be marked as Invisible

ColdBodied.Label: Cold Bodied
ColdBodied.Notes: When applied, this Condition will cause the affected Token to not longer be visible to "Sense Heat" detection

Fly.Label: Fly
Fly.Notes: When applied, this Condition will cause the affected Token to not longer be visible to "Feel Tremor" detection

Burrow.Label: Burrow
Burrow.Notes: When applied, this Condition will cause the affected Token to not longer be visible to sight based detection

BoostTrait.Label: Boost Trait
BoostTrait.Notes: When applied, this Condition will open the Boost Trait dialog

LowerTrait.Label: Lower Trait
LowerTrait.Notes: When applied, this Condition will open the Lower Trait dialog

Smite.Label: Smite
Smite.Notes: When applied, this Condition will open the Smite dialog

Protection.Label: Protection
Protection.Notes: When applied, this Condition will open the Protection dialog

Deflection.Label: Deflection
Deflection.Notes: When applied, this Condition will open the Deflection dialog

Numb.Label: Numb
Numb.Notes: When applied, this Condition will open the Numb dialog

Conviction.Label: Conviction
Conviction.Notes: When applied, this Condition will activate Conviction on the affected Token

Encumbered.Label: Encumbered
Encumbered.Notes: If enabled, this condition will be added to actors that are exceeding the carry limit, if the 'Apply Encumbrance Penalties' setting in SWADE is active (and will also respect the relevant setting in BRSW)

SpecialStatusEffectOverride.Title: Override Existing Condition for this Status Effect?
SpecialStatusEffectOverride.Content:
Another Condition ({existingCondition}) is already setup to apply this special Status Effect: {statusEffect}.

If you click 'Yes' and Save this Condition's Options you will override that existing mapping.

OptionConfig.SaveNote: Note: Clicking Save will Save Condition Lab Mapping

ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.ShowSortDirectionDialogN: Show Condition Lab Sort Direction Save Dialog
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.ShowSortDirectionDialogH: Whether or not to show the confirmation dialog for saving the sort direction.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.UseSystemIconsH: If true, conditions will default to using the default system icon when available.

ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Title: Condition Lab
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ActiveEffects.Ti: Active Effect Config (Disabled - Save Mapping First)
Active Effect Config (Disabled - Can Only Edit Custom Mappings)
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.SaveMacro.Title: Creates a toggle condition macro and adds it to the hotbar
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Import.NoFile: You did not upload a data file!
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ConfirmDeleteCon: Are you sure you want to delete this row?
Are you sure you want to restore this mapping to defaults?

If you save, this change will be permanent.

If you save, this change will be permanent.
Clear cache and reload defaults from module folder
Remove conditions added through the Condition Lab
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ResetFormContent:
Are you sure you want to reset the form?

You will lose any unsaved changes.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.SaveFailed: Condition Lab failed to Save and Close
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.Title: Options:
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.Conditio: The ID for this condition. Use this to reference the condition from code/macros.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.CustomId:
Set a custom ID for this condition to make it easier to reference from code/macros
Leave blank to generate a new random ID
Another condition already has this ID. ID has not been changed.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.OutputCh: Output this condition to chat when added/removed
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.RemoveOt: Remove other conditions when this one is applied
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.UseAsSta: Condition will be included in the list of Foundry status effects e.g. it will appear in the Assign Status Effects menu. This allows you to have conditions that you can apply via macro or the API without cluttering up the UI.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.ChatCard.Error.Token: The token associated with this condition change was not found.
Boost Trait raises a single Trait of the recipient. Please choose the affected Trait and the degree of success the caster had.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Dialog.DeflectionBui: Deflection causes foes to subtract 2 from either melee or ranged attacks or both with a raise. Please choose the type of Deflection to apply.
Lower Trait lowers a single Trait of the recipient. Please choose the affected Trait and the degree of success the caster had.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Dialog.NumbBuilder.B: Numb reduces the target's Wound and Fatigue penalties by 1 or 2 with a raise. Please choose the degree of success the caster had.
Smite increases the damage potential of one of the target's weapons. Select the weapon and modifiers.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Dialog.ProtectionBui: Protection increases the armor or toughness of the recipient. Please choose the amount to increase and click on the appropriate button, depending on modifiers used by the spellcaster.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Dialog.NoWeapons: No weapon to apply smite to was found.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Dialog.RemoveTempora:
You are about to delete all active effects from all tokens not currently in combat that are present on the scene with the name {sceneName}.

This can not be undone. Do you really want to proceed?
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Notification.NoConvi: This actor has no conviction tokens left.
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.CoreIconsH: A copy of the core status icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.DefaultCondi: Select which conditions will be included in the default list
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.SystemH: A reference to the game system. Defaults to other if not known to the module
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.OutputCombat: On each round of Combat, output any conditions for the current combatant to chat
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.DefaultMapH: Module-provided maps of conditions to icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.RemoveDefaul: Remove existing status effect icons from token HUD
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.MapTypeH: Condition map type currently in use -- default, custom or other
SUCC.setting.default_icons_hint: Setting this option will use the default icons from the SWADE system instead of the ones shipped with this module. Do not activate if you want to use your own icons configured below.
SUCC.setting.output_to_chat_hint: When active, this will create a chat message when default conditions are changed on an actor or token. The chat message will contain a rules reference link, if either the SWADE core rules module or the SWPF rules module is activated. This is especially useful for new players as the relevant rules can be opened on a single click.
SUCC.dialogue.protection_builder_dialogu: Protection increases the armor or toughness of the recipient. Please choose the amount to increase and click on the appropriate button, depending on modifiers used by the spellcaster.
SUCC.dialogue.smite_builder_dialogue: Smite increases the damage of one of the recipients weapons. Please choose the weapon and amount to increase the weapons damage.
SUCC.smite.no_weapons: No weapon to apply smite to was found.
SUCC.setting.modify_status_definitions_h: JSON to modify the default system status values
SUCC.setting.boost_lower_hint: If set to true, two new conditions will be added to apply the effects of the boost/lower power.
SUCC.dialogue.boost_builder_dialogue: Boost raises a single Trait of the recipient. Please choose the affected Trait and the degree of success the caster had.
SUCC.dialogue.lower_builder_dialogue: Lower lowers a single Trait of the recipient. Please choose the affected Trait and the degree of success the caster had.
SUCC.setting.disable_status_dialogue: Disable Shaken, Stunned and Bleeding Out removal dialogue:
SUCC.setting.disable_status_dialogue_hin: If set to true, the game will not show the dialogue to remove Shaken and Stunned, allowing you to make rolls for it without the need to dismiss the dialogue.
SUCC.notification.no_conviction_token_le: This actor has no conviction tokens left.
